mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FESTIVAL WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( SEQ,ID,TITLE,CONTENT, PCOUNT,PRICE, PLACE,THUMBNAIL,FSEQ, WDATE,DEL,TNAME) VALUES( SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{title},#{content}, #{pcount},#{price}, #{place},#{thumbNail},#{fseq}, SYSDATE,0,'PRODUCT')
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, PCOUNT=#{pcount}, PRICE=#{price}, PLACE=#{place}, THUMBNAIL=#{thumbNail}, FSEQ=#{fseq} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILEPDS( SEQ,PSEQ,FILENAMEBF,FILENAMEAF,TNAME) VALUES( SEQ_FILEPDS.NEXTVAL,(SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM PRODUCT), #{fileNameBf}, #{fileNameAf}, 'PRODUCT')
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SEQ,ID,TITLE,CONTENT,PCOUNT,PRICE,PLACE,THUMBNAIL,FSEQ,WDATE,DEL,TNAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{findWord}||'%'
ORDER BY SEQ ASC)
WHERE ROWNUM<=#{startNum}
ORDER BY SEQ DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM<=#{countPerPage}
ORDER BY SEQ DESC

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{findWord}||'%'
ORDER BY SEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM FILEPDS WHERE TNAME='PRODUCT' AND PSEQ=#{seq}
SELECT C.SEQ,C.ID,C.PSEQ,C.MYCOUNT,C.OSEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,THUMBNAIL,PCOUNT,WDATE,P.DEL,FSEQ,PLACE,PRICE,TNAME FROM CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE C.PSEQ = P.SEQ AND C.ID=#{id} AND OSEQ=0
SELECT C.SEQ,C.ID,C.PSEQ,C.MYCOUNT,OSEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,THUMBNAIL,PCOUNT,WDATE,P.DEL,FSEQ,PLACE,PRICE,TNAME FROM CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE C.PSEQ = P.SEQ AND C.SEQ = #{seq}
